_comment: Manual image overrides for articles using fallback images. Map article URLs to image filenames in public/data/image-overrides/. The fetch script will resize and convert them to WebP automatically.
_usage: 1. Check the 'Fallback Image Report' GitHub Issue for articles using fallback images. 2. Visit the article URL and save its feature image. 3. Drop the image into public/data/image-overrides/ (any format: jpg, png, webp). 4. Add an entry below mapping the article URL to the image filename. 5. Commit and push â€” the next fetch run will pick it up.
